fields.title: Biome Filter
fields.description: Filter to limit spawns to specific biomes.

fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Operator
fields.description: The comparison to apply with 'value'.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

fields.title: Herds
fields.description: Configurations for size and events when spawning groups of entities

fields.title: Event
fields.description: An event to run after 'event_skip_count' number of entities in the group have spawned

fields.title: Event Skip Count
fields.description: Number of entities spawned in the group to skip before running the event

fields.title: Initial Event
fields.description: Event run for the first 'initial_event_count' number of the group are placed.

fields.title: Initial Event Count
fields.description: Number of times that 'initial_event' can run

fields.title: Max
fields.description: Maximum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn

fields.title: Min
fields.description: Minimum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn

fields.title: Mob Event Filter
fields.description: Filter to exclude entities if the event is disabled.

fields.title: Permute Types
fields.description: List of randomly choosable permutations of the entity

fields.title: Entity Type
fields.description: Specifies the entity type to spawn when selected

fields.title: Min Guaranteed
fields.description: The minimum number of this permutation's entity to spawn

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: The likelihood of this to be selected over the combined weight of all the entities in the permutation

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: The weight used when comparing other entities that can  spawn within a biome

fields.title: Placement
fields.description: Placement rule defintions

fields.title: Heightmap
fields.description: Defines the heightmap filter for initial entity placement during chunk loading.

fields.title: Spawn Obion Predicate
fields.description: Checks for obstructions that might prevent entity spawning.

fields.title: Spawn Predicate
fields.description: Determines if an entity is valid to spawn based on specific conditions.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: Specifies the environment where the entity can spawn (e.g., on ground, in water, etc.).
